titleStmt.title: A true report of the great costs and charges of the five hospitals in the City of London, under the care of the Lord Mayor, communalty, and citizens of London in the maintenance of their great number of poore this present yeare 1647. as followeth.

notesStmt.note: A report on Christ's hospital, St. Bartholomew's, St. Thomas's, Bridewell, and Bethlem.
Imprint place and date from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
